00040 #ifndef _internalmotionstate_cpp
00041 #define _internalmotionstate_cpp
00042 
00043 #include "internalmotionstate.h.cpp"
00044 
00045 namespace phys{
00046     namespace internal{
00047         ///////////////////////////////////
00048         // PhysMotionState
00049         PhysMotionState::PhysMotionState()
00050         {
00051             this->initposition.setIdentity();
00052         }
00053 
00054         PhysMotionState::PhysMotionState(Ogre::SceneNode* scenenode)
00055         {
00056             this->snode=scenenode;
00057             this->initposition.setIdentity();
00058         }
00059 
00060         PhysMotionState::~PhysMotionState()
00061         {
00062             if (snode!=NULL)
00063             {
00064                 delete snode;
00065             }
00066         }
00067 
00068         void PhysMotionState::SetNode(Ogre::SceneNode* scenenode)
00069         {
00070             this->snode=scenenode;
00071         }
00072 
00073         void PhysMotionState::SetPosition(Vector3 position)
00074         {
00075             this->initposition.setOrigin(position.GetBulletVector3());
00076         }
00077 
00078         void PhysMotionState::SetOrientation(Quaternion orientation)
00079         {
00080             this->initposition.setRotation(orientation.GetBulletQuaternion());
00081         }
00082 
00083         void PhysMotionState::getWorldTransform(btTransform &worldTrans) const
00084         {
00085             worldTrans=initposition;
00086         }
00087 
00088         void PhysMotionState::setWorldTransform(const btTransform &worldTrans)
00089         {
00090             btQuaternion rotation = worldTrans.getRotation();
00091             this->snode->setOrientation(rotation.w(), rotation.x(), rotation.y(), rotation.z());
00092             btVector3 position = worldTrans.getOrigin();
00093             this->snode->setPosition(position.x(), position.y(), position.z());
00094         }
00095     }// /internal
00096 }// /phys
00097 #endif
